ComicInfo.Summary: Sometimes the worst that can happen is that your dreams come true, and they turn out to be nightmares. Take, for example, Max Brody. He's a guy struggling to live up to his father's legend and make a name for himself in the wild world of professional wrestling. All he needs is one break. He gets that break, but is it worth it? Is fame and fortune enough for a man to risk his very soul? What is the bizarre connection between ancient Aztec curses and the world of professional wrestling? Find out, as wrestler Max Brody dons a mysterious black mask and takes on the persona of the Holy Terror. Join us as Max discovers that real battles have no scripted outcome, and glory is a small reward in exchange for one man's soul!
